name: Jquery Fast Site

screenshots.caption: Main Page of project page made with JQFS

short_description:
JQFS is a minimalist CMS using text and Jquery plugins.... It is designed to allow to add quickly plugins and oriented in smal doc sites, or small project sites.

JQuery Fast Site is 
* Without Database 
* Four line configuration file 
* With one simple CSS file
* LGPL licence 
* You have to fill text files for each menu item 
* Each text file can be completed with simple tag
* A elementary structure to add many Jquery Plugins
* Very light on your server disk 
* UTF8 complient
* good for documentation site, personal site and more 

 JQuery Fast Site is not
* A CMS for big sites
* A CMS with many features 

To use JQuery Fast Site you have to 
* know CSS if you want to change this presentation
* know JQuery concept if you want to add some JQuery Plugins
* use ftp or scp to transfert the site
summary: Minimalist CMS for small site, using JQuery
